categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: The size and bulk of a fixed blade means it's not always practical – that’s where a folder comes in. With beautiful curly birch handle scales that are sculpted to nest perfectly in your hand, the Dokka is a quality tool designed for decades of use. The drop-point blade uses 3-layer steel for a mix of toughness and edge retention, without being hard to sharpen. Featuring a traditional Scandi grind, the edge excels at bushcraft and other outdoor tasks.Laminated steel sandwiches hard steel between softer steel sides for edge retention, and ease of sharpening.Scandinavian (Scandi) grind excels at bushcraft tasks.Handle scales are carved out of curly birch wood.Sculpted guard keeps fingers safe from the edge.Brass-lined lanyard tube is ready for your personalized lanyard.Lock-back design is easy to operate and keeps the blade anchored in use.Leather belt pouch lets you free up pocket space and still keep it handy.Helle knives have been made in a small Norwegian village nestled in the mountains and fjords since 1932. Created by craftsman who take pride in their work. Each Helle knife has passed through experienced hands on its way to your belt.Crafted from natural materials, each knife has its own personality, and no 2 will be the same. Variations in colour and patterns will occur.
